titles.title: To amend title 39, United States Code, to provide the authority to extend to essential civilian personnel serving in support of military operations abroad, the same mailing privileges as are available to members of the Armed Forces serving in the same area.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Postal Operations and Services.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Subcommittee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Forwarded by Subcommittee to Full Committee.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service

action.text: Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

committee.name: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Extends to civilian personnel serving abroad in support of military operations the same mailing privileges available to members of the armed forces serving in such area.
